articles.title: Russian fighter jet hits American drone over Black Sea: US - The Indian Express
articles.description: The incident comes amid soaring Russian-US tensions over Moscow’s war in Ukraine.
articles.content: A Russian fighter jet struck the propeller of a US surveillance drone over the Black Sea on Tuesday in a brazen violation of international law, causing American forces to bring down the unmanned aeri… [+8253 chars]

articles.title: Honduras to seek China relations, pressuring Taiwan ahead of US trip - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Honduran President Xiomara Castro said on Tuesday she had asked the country's foreign minister to open official relations with China, pressuring Taiwan ahead of a sensitive visit by President Tsai Ing-wen to the United States and Central America.

articles.title: Why US troops remain in Iraq 20 years after 'shock and awe' - The Associated Press - en Español
